abstract: A look at false equivalence and false inequivalence in the fight over climate change.
snippet: A look at false equivalence and false inequivalence in the fight over climate change.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

lead_paragraph: Just over a week ago, I wrote a quick post on a new sociological analysis of organized efforts to sow doubt about global warming. The analysis was illustrated by a flow chart of what the researchers called the "climate change denial machine." I added an update a day later describing a chart of the "climate alarmism machine" created in response by an Australian blogger.

headline.main: On False Equivalence and False Inequivalence
